title: ASHRAE 205 RS0003 JSON Schema
description: A schema for ASHRAE 205 annex RS0003 Fan Assembly

model_number.description: Model number of the assembly / unit

has_motor.notes: True indicates input power is electrical power. False implies input power is shaft power driven externally.

enclosed.notes: If true, the performance data reflects the static pressure difference across the enclosure

direct_drive_impeller.description: Motor and impeller are directly coupled
direct_drive_impeller.notes: False if impeller is belt driven or if assembly does not include a motor.

number_of_impellers.description: Number of impellers included in the fan assembly

component_ID.description: Identification number of the corresponding Standard 205 representation
component_ID.notes: If the component has a Standard 205 representation, otherwise NULL

nominal_volumetric_air_flow_rate.description: Nominal air flow rate for fan assembly
nominal_volumetric_air_flow_rate.notes: Nominal or rated air flow rate

wet_surface_pressure_drop.description: Additional static pressure drop if cooling coil component is collecting condensate
wet_surface_pressure_drop.notes: Corresponds to pressure drop at nominal_volumetric_air_flow_rate

motor_heat_fraction.description: Fraction of motor heat into the air stream
motor_heat_fraction.notes: Used to determine amount of heat from motor (and drive)

power_standby.description: Assembly power draw when fan is not operating

performance_map_continuous.description: Data group describing fan performance in terms of air flow, static pressure, impeller speed, and fan electrical or shaft power

grid_variables_continuous.description: Data group describing grid variables for continuous fan performance

volumetric_air_flow_rate.description: Volumetric air flow rate through fan assembly

static_pressure_difference.description: Static pressure across fan assembly at dry coil conditions

lookup_variables_continuous.description: Data group describing lookup variables for continuous fan performance

input_power.notes: Shaft or electric power depending on 'has_motor'

performance_map_continuous.notes: Applies for fan assemblies that can operate continuously over a range of shaft speeds.

performance_map_discrete.description: Data group describing fan performance in terms of speed setting, static pressure, air flow, and power

grid_variables_discrete.description: Data group describing grid variables for discrete fan performance

speed_number.description: Number indicating discrete speed of fan impeller

static_pressure_difference.description: Static pressure across fan assembly at dry coil conditions

grid_variables_discrete.notes: Applies for fan assemblies that operate at discrete rotational speeds, either with or without flow control feature

lookup_variables_discrete.discription: Data group describing lookup variables for discrete fan performance

volumetric_air_flow_rate.description: Volumetric air flow rate through fan assembly

input_power.notes: Shaft or electric power depending on 'has_motor'

grid_variables_standby.description: Data group defining the grid variables for standby performance

environment_dry_bulb_temperature.description: Dry bulb temperature of the air in the environment

lookup_variables_standby.description: Data group defining the grid variables for standby performance

input_power.description: Total power consumed by the fan assembly when not running.
